name: SOLAR shooter!
description:
Two previous projects combines into one exciting game!

Careful, don't get too close, or too far from the sun.

Player movement is drifty in space, and dynamically zooms the camera.

Random meteors can be dangerous for both you and your enemies.

Your speed and health can be upgraded by picking up powerups.

Each enemy gives you points and has a % chance to drop powerups.

The game increases in difficulty the more points you get. 

Final boss spawns at 10,000 points, good luck gamers!
